title: Tropical Island
description:
An island on the equator where the cruise sank and barely arrived through the day. 
How do I survive in a place where no one is present, how do I get back? 

Then, he found a man who had been pushed into the sea water. 
Unconscious, arrogant Alpha. 

“… … You can't let it die.” 

I dragged it to a safe place, watered it to keep it from dying, and 

said , "Fuck, no!" 

Get caught up in Alpha's rut. 

―Can you safely leave the island?
